author: fabiocos
body:
#### PR description:

This PR adds a revised version of the ```mtd.xml``` file for scenario D41 where:

- the ETL material budget is adjusted for a missing aluminum ring (~5% of X0), used for material budget plots for TDR;

- the warnings for duplicated definition of material are removed by a redefinition, no impact on SimHits is anyway observed in checks.

This is the stripped version of a complete new scenario implementation https://github.com/fabiocos/cmssw/tree/fc-MTDpostD41 based on this revised geometry. At present it does not seem really necessary, and I prefer to avoid proliferation of not strictly needed new scenarios,
but I would like to have an official reference for this revised implementation.

#### PR validation:

No overlap is present (even if plugged in tracker geometry T15), the numbering scheme is obviously untouched, if plugged in a new scenario the SingleMu workflow runs smoothly.
title: MTD geometry: post D41 technical fixes
